comment: по клику на палатку, разбитую в когитаторе, баркает Паскаль

languages.text: "Как они осмелились обосноваться прямо в чреве священной машины! Это — надругательство над благословенными останками!"
"How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"
languages.original_text: "Как они осмелились обосноваться прямо в чреве священной машины! Это — надругательство над благословенными останками!"

traits.locale_text: "How dared they set up camp right in the belly of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"
"How dared they set up camp right in the belly of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"
"How dare they set up camp right in the belly of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"
"How dare they set up camp right in the belly of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"
"How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"
"How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"

languages.text: 「よくも神聖な機械の中枢に、キャンプを設営してくれたな！これは祝福されし遺物への冒涜だ！」
languages.original_text: "How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"

traits.locale_text: 「よくも神聖な機械の中枢に、キャンプを設営してくれたな！これは祝福されし遺物への冒涜だ！」

languages.text: “他们怎么敢在神圣机器的心脏筑巢！这简直是对圣洁遗物的亵渎！”
languages.original_text: "How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"

traits.locale_text: “他们怎么敢在神圣机器的腹部筑巢！这简直是对圣洁遗物的亵渎！”

languages.text: « Comment osent-ils s'installer au cœur même de la machine sacrée ? C'est un sacrilège envers les vestiges bénis ! »
languages.original_text: "How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment osent-ils s'installer dans les entrailles mêmes de la machine sacrée ? C'est un sacrilège envers les vestiges bénis ! »

languages.text: «¿Cómo se atreven a montar un campamento en el corazón de una máquina sagrada? ¡Es un sacrilegio contra estos restos benditos!».
languages.original_text: "How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo se atreven a montar campamento en el centro de una máquina sagrada? ¡Es un sacrilegio contra estos restos benditos!».

languages.text: "Wie können sie es wagen, mitten im Herzen der heiligen Maschine ihr Lager aufzuschlagen! Das ist ein Sakrileg gegen die gesegneten Überreste!"
languages.original_text: "How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie können sie es wagen, mitten im Bauch der heiligen Maschine ihr Lager aufzuschlagen! Das ist ein Sakrileg gegen die gesegneten Überreste!"

languages.text: "Ne cüretle kutsal makinenin kalbine kamp kurarlar? Kutsanmış kalıntılara hürmetsizliktir bu!"
languages.original_text: "How dare they set up camp right in the heart of the sacred machine! This is a sacrilege against the blessed remains!"

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal makinenin kalbine kamp kurmaya nasıl cüret ederler! Kutsanmış kalıntılara karşı bir hakarettir bu!"
